## Cargamos las librerias 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(datasauRus)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Mostramos resumen del dataset 

```{r}
datasaurus_dozen %>%
  group_by(dataset) %>%
  summarize(
    mean_X = mean(x),
    mean_y = mean(y),
    std_dev_x = sd(x),
    std_dev_y = sd(y),
    corr_x_y = cor(x,y)
    
  )
```

## Visializaci√≥n del Datasaurus

```{r}
ggplot(datasaurus_dozen, aes(x = x, y = y, color = dataset)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6, size = 1.5) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  facet_wrap(~dataset, ncol = 3) +
  labs(title = "Datasaurus Dozen")

```
